pageContext.claim: “Republican cities and states are doing incredibly well. We're at records. We have been at records.”
pageContext.analysis: In fact, coronavirus cases were rising in states across the country, some weeks hitting states with relatively tougher restrictions, and at other points hitting states with looser restrictions. Trump often sought to paint a picture of Republican-led states doing reasonably well and Democratic-led states faring poorly, but never backed up his claim with facts or data.
